content.raw:
I was confused about this pull request because [Jenkins can build the default branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-default-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/48/). Apparently, installing `libgdal-dev` causes `libhdf5-dev` to be installed as well, so we weren't seeing the error in jenkins.

This is the risk with optional dependencies I guess: lots of different build configurations to be tested.
content.html:
I was confused about this pull request because Jenkins can build the default branch. Apparently, installing libgdal-dev causes libhdf5-dev to be installed as well, so we weren't seeing the error in jenkins.

This is the risk with optional dependencies I guess: lots of different build configurations to be tested.
